statements: SELECT * FROM RoomAvailability WHERE room_id = 101;
SELECT is_available, check_in_date FROM RoomAvailability WHERE booking_id = 201;
SELECT room_id, booking_id FROM RoomAvailability WHERE is_available = true;
SELECT * FROM RoomAvailability WHERE check_in_date < '2022-06-01';
SELECT booking_id, check_out_date FROM RoomAvailability WHERE room_id = 102;
SELECT * FROM RoomAvailability WHERE room_id = 101 AND is_available = true;
SELECT room_id, booking_id, check_in_date FROM RoomAvailability WHERE check_out_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM RoomAvailability ORDER BY check_in_date ASC, room_id DESC;
SELECT room_id, COUNT(*) as num_bookings FROM RoomAvailability WHERE is_available = true GROUP BY room_id;
SELECT room_id, booking_id, check_in_date, check_out_date FROM RoomAvailability WHERE booking_id IS NOT NULL ORDER BY booking_id DESC, check_in_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM rooms;
SELECT room_name, capacity FROM rooms WHERE capacity > 10;
SELECT room_id, room_name, capacity FROM rooms ORDER BY room_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM bookings WHERE check_in_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT booking_id, room_id, check_in_date, check_out_date FROM bookings ORDER BY booking_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM rooms WHERE capacity > 10 ORDER BY room_id DESC;
SELECT room_name, capacity FROM rooms WHERE room_name LIKE '%A%' ORDER BY room_name ASC;
SELECT b.booking_id, r.room_name, b.check_in_date, b.check_out_date FROM bookings b INNER JOIN rooms r ON b.room_id = r.room_id WHERE b.check_in_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY b.check_in_date ASC;
SELECT r.room_id, r.room_name, COUNT(b.booking_id) AS total_bookings FROM rooms r LEFT JOIN bookings b ON r.room_id = b.room_id GROUP BY r.room_id, r.room_name ORDER BY total_bookings DESC;
SELECT r.room_name, r.capacity, b.check_in_date, b.check_out_date FROM rooms r LEFT JOIN bookings b ON r.room_id = b.room_id WHERE b.check_out_date > '2022-06-30' ORDER BY b.check_out_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM RoomAvailability ORDER BY room_id DESC;
SELECT booking_id, guest_name, booking_date FROM Bookings WHERE booking_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT room_id, COUNT(*) AS total_bookings FROM Bookings GROUP BY room_id;
SELECT guest_name, check_in_date, check_out_date FROM Bookings WHERE guest_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT * FROM Occupancy ORDER BY check_in_date ASC, check_out_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM RoomAvailability WHERE available = True;
SELECT booking_id, guest_name, booking_date, check_in_date, check_out_date FROM Bookings WHERE booking_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT b.booking_id, b.guest_name, r.available FROM Bookings b LEFT JOIN RoomAvailability r ON b.room_id = r.room_id;
SELECT guest_name, booking_date, check_in_date, check_out_date FROM Bookings ORDER BY booking_date DESC;
SELECT b.booking_id, b.guest_name, o.check_in_date, o.check_out_date FROM Bookings b JOIN Occupancy o ON b.booking_id = o.booking_id WHERE o.check_in_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM RoomAvailability;
SELECT room_id, room_name FROM RoomAvailability WHERE occupancy_status = 'Available';
SELECT booking_id, guest_name, booking_date FROM Bookings ORDER BY booking_date DESC;
SELECT room_id, total_cost FROM Bookings WHERE total_cost > 500 ORDER BY total_cost DESC;
SELECT revenue_id, total_revenue FROM Revenue WHERE total_revenue < 1000;
SELECT * FROM RoomAvailability
SELECT room_name, occupancy_status FROM RoomAvailability
SELECT booking_id, guest_name, total_cost FROM Bookings ORDER BY total_cost DESC
SELECT * FROM Bookings WHERE check_in_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30'
SELECT guest_name, total_revenue FROM Bookings JOIN Revenue ON Bookings.booking_id = Revenue.booking_id
SELECT * FROM Room;
SELECT room_id, room_name FROM Room ORDER BY room_capacity DESC;
SELECT room_id, room_name, room_capacity FROM Room WHERE room_type = 'Suite';
SELECT * FROM Booking WHERE check_in_date >= '2022-01-01' AND check_out_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT guest_id, guest_name, email FROM Guest ORDER BY guest_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Room;
SELECT room_name, room_type, room_capacity FROM Room ORDER BY room_capacity DESC;
SELECT * FROM Booking WHERE check_in_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';

SELECT Guest.guest_name, Booking.check_in_date, Revenue.amount FROM Guest JOIN Booking ON Guest.guest_name = Booking.guest_name JOIN Revenue ON Booking.booking_id = Revenue.booking_id WHERE Revenue.currency = 'USD';
SELECT Room.room_name, Occupancy.check_in_date, Occupancy.check_out_date FROM Room JOIN Occupancy ON Room.room_id = Occupancy.room_id ORDER BY Occupancy.check_in_date ASC;
